name: Wedding Escape (itch)
description:
This game has been made in 7 days for the Fantasy Console Game Jam (https://itch.io/jam/fantasy-console-game-jam-1) with the theme Union.

The goal of this game is to stay single as long as possible by avoiding the 3 women who want to get married

Use the left and right buttons to move, the up button to jump and the down to go below the rocks.
